mean_cn: adj.成年男子的，有男子气概的，强壮的
mean_en: having or suggesting qualities (such as strength and sexual energy) that are associated with men and that are usually considered attractive in men
sentence: The virile dog has fathered an army of puppies.
sentence_trans: 这只强壮的公狗是一群小狗的父亲。
word_etyma: vir男 ＋ ile形容词后缀 → virile男性的，有男子气概的
